results.title: Thomas Edison 1847-1931
results.brief_description: Original footage and re-enactments are used to tell the story of Thomas Edison. Examines his accidental entry into telegraphy: his creation of an inventions factory; and his many inventions such as the light bulb, the alkaline battery, the electric train, the ediphone, the gramophone, and the motion picture camera.
results.description: Original footage and re-enactments are used to tell the story of Thomas Edison. results.title: Thomas and the jet engine
results.creator_credit: Britt Allcroft, David Mitton and Britt Allcroft Co
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Thomas the tank engine & friends”.
It’s full steam ahead for Thomas, the little blue engine and his special friends Gordon, Henry, James, Percy, Edward, Toby, Annie and Clarabel and their boss, the Fat Controller. The stories are narrated by Michael Angelis.

results.title: Thomas
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Young Children in Brief Separation”
Thomas, a child of 2 years and 4 months spends ten days in foster care, in a family situation, He understands the reasons for the separation, and maintains a clear image of his absent mother.

results.title: This woman is not a car
results.creator_credit: Arid Zone Productions, Jenny Jacobs, Vyner Gillespie and Margaret Dodd
results.brief_description: A mother, isolated in an outer Adelaide suburb, drives a station wagon full of children to a distant beach. Imagination and reality fuse. Her sense of herself is assaulted by car fetishists in a rural service station. Memory, fear and fantasy are interwoven as this experimental film takes woman’s assigned role in the ‘Australian Dream’ to its absurd conclusion. Music: Brian Eno, The Fabulous Nudes, The Pelaco Bros. Actors include Pauline Sedgwick, Daniel Sedgwick, Lisa Sedgwick, Gareth Sedgwick and Katrina Sedgwick.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Arid Zone Productions, Jenny Jacobs, Vyner Gillespie and Margaret Dodd
